globalMetadata._appFooter: <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/clipboard@2/dist/clipboard.min.js"></script><script>!function(){"use strict";function a(){document.querySelectorAll("pre code").forEach(function(a,b){const c=a.parentElement;if(!c.querySelector(".copy-button")){const d=document.createElement("button");d.className="copy-button",d.textContent="Copy",d.setAttribute("data-clipboard-target","#code-"+b),d.setAttribute("aria-label","Copy code to clipboard"),a.id="code-"+b,c.style.position="relative",c.appendChild(d)}});if("undefined"!=typeof ClipboardJS){const a=new ClipboardJS(".copy-button");a.on("success",function(a){const b=a.trigger;b.textContent="Copied!",b.classList.add("copied"),setTimeout(function(){b.textContent="Copy",b.classList.remove("copied")},2e3),a.clearSelection()}),a.on("error",function(a){const b=a.trigger;b.textContent="Copy failed",setTimeout(function(){b.textContent="Copy"},2e3)})}}"loading"===document.readyState?document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",a):a(),window.addEventListener("load",a)}();</script>
